markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Linguist's Dictionary](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2180)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 112 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Items with effects that have an undetermined duration, end their effects at the end of a scenario or adventure unless specifically stated otherwise by the campaign rules._

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Bound in sturdy leather, this thick book has several colorful bookmarks and page dividers. Its title and text shift between numerous languages.

<document level="2" id="action-1677" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

>
Linguist's Dictionary (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 112 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The dictionary can hold three languages at a time.
